# 3 BALLS AND A CORNER BEHIND
#C 0,0,0 0,1,0 1,0,0 90
#A 0.2 255,255,255
#L 1,1,1 0.3 255,255,255
#sp 0,15,-1 5 0,0,255 1
#sp 0,15,-206 200 255,0,0 1
#sp -10,15,1 4 255,255,255 2
#sp 10,15,1 4 255,255,255 2
#pl 0,40,0 -1,-1,0 255,255,0 1
#pl 0,40,0 1,-1,0 0,255,255 1
#cy -2,10,0 0,1,1 1.5 4 0,255,0 1

# 1 CYLINDER
#C 0,0,0 0,1,0 1,0,0 90
#C 15,15,0 -1,0,0 0,1,0 90
#A 0.2 255,255,255
#L 1,1,1 0.3 255,255,0
#cy 4,15,0 0,1,-1 3 8 255,255,0 1
#sp 0,15,-206 200 255,0,0 1
#cy 0,15,0 0,1,0 2 10 200,200,200 1
#sp 0,15,0 1 0,0,255 1

# 2 CYLINDERS IN FRONT OF A MIRROR
#C 0,0,0 0,1,0 1,0,0 90
#A 0.2 255,255,255
#L 1,1,1 0.3 255,255,0
#pl 0,25,0 0,1,0 255,255,255 2
#cy 4,15,0 0,1,1 3 8 255,255,0 1
#cy -4,15,0 0,1,-1 3 8 255,255,0 1
#sp 0,15,-206 200 255,0,0 1

# 2 CYLINDERS ON THE GROUND
#C 0,0,0 0,1,0 1,0,0 90
#A 0.2 255,255,255
#L 1,1,1 0.3 255,255,0
#sp 0,15,-206 200 255,0,0 1
#cy 0,15,-1 0,0,1 2 3 0,255,0 1
#cy 10,25,2 1,0.4,0 3 3 255,255,255 4

# 1 NORMAL BALL AND 2 MIRROR BALLS
#C 0,0,0 0,1,0 1,0,0 90
#A 0.2 255,255,255
#L 1,1,1 0.3 255,255,0
#sp 0,15,-206 200 255,0,0 1
#sp 0,15,0 4 0,0,255 1
#sp -7,15,0 4 255,255,255 2
#sp 7,15,0 4 255,255,255 2

# 1 BALL AND 1 GRAY MIRROR BEHIND
#C 0,0,0 0,1,0 1,0,0 90
#A 0.2 255,255,255
#L 1,1,1 0.3 255,255,0
#sp 0,15,-1 5 0,0,255 1
#pl 0,0,-6 0,0,1 255,0,0 1
#pl 0,30,0 1,-1,0 130,130,130 2
#cy -2,5,0 0,0,1 0.5 3 0,255,0 1

# 2 PERPENDICULAR MIRRORS AND 1 BALL
#C 0,0,0 0,1,0 1,0,0 90
#A 0.2 255,255,255
#L 1,1,1 0.3 255,255,0
#sp 0,15,-1 2 0,0,255 1
#pl 0,0,-6 0,0,1 255,0,0 1
#pl 0,30,0 1,-1,0 200,200,200 2
#pl 0,30,0 -1,-1,0 200,200,200 2
#cy -2,5,0 0,0,1 0.5 3 0,255,0 1

# 2 INTERSECTING BALLS
#C 0,0,0 0,1,0 1,0,0 90
#A 0.2 255,255,255
#L 0,0,10 0.9 255,255,255
#sp 0,0,0 1 0,0,255 1
#sp 1,0,0 1 0,0,255 1

# 1 BALL AND A CYLINDER
#C 0,0,0 0,1,0 1,0,0 90
#A 0.15 150,255,255
#L -5,0,0 60 255,150,150
#L 5,0,0 40 100,255,100
#L 5,0,0 50 255,255,255
#sp 0,15,0 6 255,255,255 1
#cy 10,15,3 0,-0.2,1 2 4 255,255,255 1
#pl 0,30,0 0,1,0 200,200,200 1
#pl 0,0,-6 0,0,1 255,0,0 1

# INDIRECT LIGHTING TEST
#C 0,0,0 0,1,0 1,0,0 90
#A 1 255,255,255
#L -10,15,0 100 255,255,255
#sp 0,15,0 2 0,0,255 1
#sp 5,15,0 1 0,255,0 1
#pl 0,32,0 0,1,0 180,180,180 1
#pl 0,32,-10 0,0,1 180,180,180 1
#pl 0,-2,0 0,1,0 180,180,180 1
#pl 0,-2,10 0,0,1 180,180,180 1

# AMBIENT LIGHTING TEST
#C 0,0,0 0,1,0 1,0,0 90
#A 0.04 255,255,255
#L -10,15,0 100 255,255,255
#sp 0,15,0 2 0,0,255 1
#sp 5,15,0 1 0,255,0 1

# CONE TEST
#C 0,0,0 0,1,0 1,0,0 90
#A 0.01 255,255,255
#L 0,5,5 50 255,255,255
#sp 5,15,0 3 0,0,255 1 1
#co -5,15,-5 0,-0.8,1 12 10 0,255,0 1
#pl 0,32,0 0,1,0 255,50,50 1
#pl 0,32,-7 0,0,1 255,255,255 1

# TEXTURE TEST
C 0,-4,0 0,1,0 1,0,0 90
A 0.01 255,255,255
L 0,-6,5 30 255,255,255
sp 0,0,0 1.8 0,0,255 1 0 0,0,1 -1,0,0
pl 0,15,0 0,1,0 255,50,50 1
pl 0,15,-7 0,0,1 255,255,255 1
